trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around September 15th 2012
Summary: I witnessed a bright white Orb passing overhead that flew North eaat from Vancouver, passing a half kilomter in front of a smalll cessna airplane
divs: sighting detailsmyself and 2 other people where standing on the outside garage patio when we all witness a bright white orb passing 30 degrees overhead. the object made no sound and was travelling hundreds of miles per hour. it passed in front of a small cessna type airplane at perhaps the same altitude at a distance of 1\2 kilometre from the small aircraft that was flying at normal cruise speed. the orb asended gradually towards the stars where we lost sight of it, amazing!
